A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: You can tell that the director is trying his best\, but the writing needed a third point of view and the contribution of a few real Star Wars fans. Rehashing old ideas and throwing in a few new pieces of flair (executioner Stormtroopers? Shiny trooper leader? Big ship that is shaped like two pizza slices put together?) just doesn't cut it.\n\nThey need fresh young minds to help craft the next generation of Star Wars movies\, reusing past ideas and action sequences is getting old fast.
